alert.note: Alert for Corson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 6:31PM MDT until June 29 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Corson County in north central South Dakota... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 631 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Meadow, or 22 miles south of Lemmon, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Shambo Ranch around 645 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Klein Ranch and Black Horse. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
